notes: Performance/analytics can use legitimate interest if no behavioral profiling
Can use implied consent for less sensitive data. Behavioral advertising requires explicit consent. Performance/analytics context-dependent.
Requires opt-in for sensitive data (unique among US states)
Must honor GPC. Opt-in for sensitive data.
Most consumer-friendly US state law. Opt-in for sensitive data.
Most business-friendly. Only opt-out for sensitive. No correction right.
Higher penalties than most US states
Minors under 14 require parental consent. Separate consent required for sensitive data. Data localization requirements.
Post-Brexit UK GDPR. Age of consent lowered from 16 to 13.
Hybrid model. Opt-in for sensitive data and third-party transfers. General data can use implied consent. Minors 12-18 need parental consent.
One of strictest in Asia. Explicit opt-in required. EU adequacy decision. Very similar to GDPR.
Shifted from consent-based to allowing legitimate interests. Highest fine percentage (10%) among APAC. Business contact info excluded.
Default template for countries without comprehensive privacy legislation
2023 law. Explicit consent required. Data fiduciary obligations.
Under reform. Currently allows implied consent.
